### 2. Summary

- The world bank data with the internet use and the covid vaccination data.
- Internet use in Afghanistan has  increased in recent 10 years. 
- Among the Asian countries, however, Afghanistan shows lowest ratio of average internet use in the year 2020.
-Among the middle East countries, Afghanistan had quite low ratio of delivery efficiency of the secured covid 19 vaccine.
